name: More of a Kind
description:
**This is a game I made under 74 hours for Touhou Game Jam, which was hosted by Touhou Station https://twitter.com/touhou_station

Move multiple Flans at the same time to the "Finish" area using ASWD keys. For every level you clear, the number of Flandre you control increases.  

If one of your Flandres falls, you lose the game.
